Dictionary.Name: Virtual Entity of Relevant Acronyms (Version 1.9, June 2002)

Definition.WordDefinition: Davis n 1: English navigator who explored the Arctic while searching for the Northwest Passage (1550-1605) [syn: {Davys}, {John Davys}, {John Davis}] 2: United States painter who developed an American version of Cubism (1894-1964) [syn: {Stuart Davis}] 3: United States jazz musician; noted for his trumpet style (1926-1991) [syn: {Miles Davis}, {Miles Dewey Davis Jr.}] 4: iAmerican statesman; president of the Confederate States of America during the Civil War (1808-1889) [syn: {Jefferson Davis}] 5: United States tennis player who donated the Davis Cup for international team tennis competition (1879-1945) [syn: {Dwight Davis}, {Dwight Filley Davis}] 6: United States film actress (1908-1989) [syn: {Bette Davis}]
